title: 010 Is context.drawImage not displaying the image on the Canvas
Make sure your image object is fully loaded before you try to draw it on the canvas with
context.drawImage
c
. Otherwise the image will silently fail to display.

inline_content.Text: Make sure your image object is fully loaded before you try to draw it on the canvas with
. Otherwise the image will silently fail to display.

title: In JavaScript, images are not loaded immediately. Instead, images are loaded asynchronously and during the time they take to load JavaScript continues executing any code that follows
image.src
c
. This means
context.drawImage
c
may be executed with an empty image and therefore will display nothing.

inline_content.Text: In JavaScript, images are not loaded immediately. Instead, images are loaded asynchronously and during the time they take to load JavaScript continues executing any code that follows
may be executed with an empty image and therefore will display nothing.
